◆ uart_id_e

enum uart_id_e

enumerate uart names that are available

Note
this is not always the same value as the uart hardware instance number
Enumerator

Function Documentation

◆ __attribute__()

__attribute__ ( (section("SHARED_RW")) )

Uart isr handlers.

Place DMA ram in SRAM and align the region for better MPU access The mpu will be used to disable the cache in this region

Note
For example purposes capture all uart ISRs here and process them in the same way.

◆ mpuConfig()

uint32_t mpuConfig ( uint32_t ui32BaseAddress,
uint32_t ui32DmaSize )

called to configure MPU (no cache) for passed in parameters

Parameters
ui32BaseAddressbase address for MPU regions (should be 32byte aligned)
ui32DmaSizesize of the mpu region in bytes
Returns
standard hal status

◆ printErrorString()

const char * printErrorString ( am_hal_uart_errors_t eErrx,
bool printError )

This will format an error string for either standard hal errors or uart specific errors.

Parameters
eErrxThe error code returned from a uart call
printErrorif true, the string will be printed in this function
Returns
Pointer to string associated with the error (eErrx) code

◆ processStreamError()

uint32_t processStreamError ( const stream_error_message_action_map_t * pSEM,
uart_examp_stream_vars_t * psAsyncLVars,
am_hal_uart_stream_status_t streamStatus )

utility function that'll print error and status messages from the stream isr service

Process isr returned status with a supplied map.

Parameters
pSEMuses an external status action map
psAsyncLVarspointer to stream variables
streamStatusthe isr return status
Returns
accumulated status from any function calls, non-zero is an error
Note
this should be called in the background, not ISR
Parameters
pSEMstatus action map
psAsyncLVarspointer to test-specific variable
streamStatusvalue returned from
Returns
standard hal status

clear this bit, this allows early termination of the loop

◆ processStreamErrorDefMap()

uint32_t processStreamErrorDefMap ( uart_examp_stream_vars_t * psAsyncLVars,
am_hal_uart_stream_status_t streamStatus )

utility function that'll print error and status messages from the stream isr service

Process isr returned status with the default map.

Parameters
psAsyncLVarspointer to stream variables
streamStatusthe isr return status
Returns
accumulated status from any function calls, non-zero is an error
Note
this should be called in the background, not ISR
Parameters
psAsyncLVarspointer to test-specific variable
streamStatus
Returns
standard hal status

◆ uart_cmn_serial_interface_init()

uint32_t uart_cmn_serial_interface_init ( uart_examp_stream_vars_t * pUartDesc,
const am_hal_uart_stream_rx_config_t * psRxStreamConfig,
const am_hal_uart_stream_tx_config_t * sTxStreamConfig )

Initialize the serial module and associated tx and tx pins.

Initialize all the serial modules and associated tx and tx pins.

Parameters
pUartDescpointer to local struct that holds uart params
psRxStreamConfigpointer to const struct that defines rx params
sTxStreamConfigpointer to const struct that defines tx params
Returns
standard hal status
Parameters
pUartDesclocal uart data and config descriptor(struct)
pui8TxBuffif null, will use SRAM DMA buff(required for DMA),
ui32TxBuffSizethe size of the tx buffer that will be used for this test
pui8RxBuffif null, will use SRAM DMA buff(required for DMA),
ui32RxBuffSizethe size of the rx buffer that will be used for this test
Returns
standard hal status
